comments:
Build 20020214 with new team code.

Was running the build, debugging, etc. for most of the afternoon.  Tried to run 
an inner eclipse and got an out of handles error.

Noticed that a lot of GDI objects were allocated and when the CVS decorators 
are added the number of GDI objects jumps significantly.  May want to make sure 
that CVS decorators are being shared amongst elements (vs. creating one for 
each element in the workspace).
Closing - duplicate of a defect that was fixed a while ago.
